Name: Lawgivers
About the game: With over 50.000 copies sold on mobile platforms, Lawgivers has now been expanded and adapted to desktop screens. We put a lot of effort trying to build an innovative political simulation game. Lawgivers Lawgivers is a turn-based political simulaton game. Take control of a party and run for elections. Tell voters what they want to hear and choose whether to accomplish your promises or not. Once inside parliament approve important laws and shape your country’s destiny. Features: ◉ Choose a party, promise actions to citizens and run for elections ◉ Approve or abolish laws with parliamentary votes ◉ Take care of lawmaker's experience, popularity and loyalty ◉ Bribe concurrent politicians in order to win majority ◉ Build up relations with other parties and appoint the president ★ 17 playable nations such as the US, Uk, Russia, Germany, or South Korea ★ Over 120 ordinary and constitutional laws ★ 38 science advances bringing new missions and events ★ no ingame shop, virtual currency or paid dlc, just free updates
Meta Title: Lawgivers: Apr 2, 2020, Damian Bernardi and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lawgivers? Check out the release date (Apr 2, 2020), developer insights from Damian Bernardi, and a complete game summary.
